General.Name: Pecca Group Bhd
General.Description: Pecca Group Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in styling, manufacturing, distribution, and installation of car seat covers for the automotive and aviation industries in Malaysia, Asia Pacific, Europe, North America, and Oceania. The company is also involved in the styling, manufacturing, distribution, and installation of car door trim covers and covers for car accessories; supply of leather cut pieces to the automotive leather upholstery industry and raw materials to the automotive upholstery industry; provision of sewing services for fabric car seat covers and wrapping and stitching services; and provision of wrapping and stitching servicers. In addition, it engages in manufacturing and distribution of healthcare products; manufacturing, repair, refurbishment, distribution, and installation of aircraft leather seat covers and other leather related products; and manufacturing and supplying of face masks, face shields, and PPE garments. The company serves the original equipment manufacturer, pre-delivery inspection, and replacement equipment manufacturer market segments. It also exports its products to the United States, Europe, Japan, Australia, New Zealand, Thailand, Indonesia, and Singapore. The company was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
